level.heading: Possession of disposable containers prohibited; exceptions. [Repealed]
Temporary Addition of Sections
level.text: For temporary (225 day) addition, see § 3 of Omnibus Sports Consolidation Act of 1994 Temporary Amendment Act of 1995 (D.C. Law 11-67, October 26, 1995, law notification 42 DCR 6172).

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary addition (90 days) of section, see § 3 of the Omnibus Sports Consolidation Act of 1994 Emergency Amendment Act of 1995 (D.C. Act 11-102, July 21, 1995, 42 DCR 4009).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-152, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 3-321.

level.heading: Transfer of Functions
level.text: Section 19(a) of D.C. Law 10-152 provides that the Sports Commission shall assume all nonmilitary functions of the Armory board as are set forth in § 2- 306 [repealed].

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Construction of Law 10-152: See note to § 3-321.
Effect of dissolution of Sports Commission: See note to § 3-321.
